title.rendered: Financial Commission welcomes Juan Jutgla CEO of Better Way FX Consulting and Smart Broker Solutions to their Dispute Resolution Committee

content.rendered:
Juan has been involved in the financial field since 1995 and he is one of the leading B2B Forex & Binary Options business experts, with a wide range of positions held in leading companies in the field. Juan was instrumental in the founding and management of successful online brokerage solutions providers. Managing Better Way FX Consulting he is currently helping brokers and technology vendors globally to expand their operation, focusing on marketing, sales, business development and UK FCA operations set up for international brokers.

The Financial Commission Chairman of the Board Peter Tatarnikov said, “The Financial Commission continues to add talented executives to its most professional Dispute Resolution Committee. Juan is one of the top professionals in the FX and Binary Options field. His experience with various FX and Binary Platforms will be a vital addition to the Financial Commission and his experience will be a great help to resolving any disputes that come in. We look forward to his contribution.”

Juan joins the Financial Commission as they continue to grow. The Financial Commission has recently presented its unique model of an Alternative Dispute Resolution and key advantages of such function during the largest B2B convention iFXEXPO held in Cyprus in May 2014. In addition the Financial Commission estimates there should be a few more members who will be announced before the end of 2014.

For more information, please contact The Financial Commission – info@financialcommission.org or by phone +1-212-392-0106
